about.description:
XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed to be highly efficient,
flexible and portable. It implements machine learning algorithms under the Gradient Boosting
framework. XGBoost provides a parallel tree boosting (also known as GBDT, GBM) that solve many
data science problems in a fast and accurate way. The same code runs on major distributed
environment (Hadoop, SGE, MPI) and can solve problems beyond billions of examples.
about.summary:
Scalable, Portable and Distributed Gradient Boosting (GBDT, GBRT or GBM) Library, for
Python, R, Java, Scala, C++ and more. Runs on single machine, Hadoop, Spark, Flink
and DataFlow

name: xgboost
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: xgboost
  version: 1.4.0
source:
  git_rev: v1.4.0
  git_url: https://github.com/dmlc/xgboost
  patches:
    - 0001-conda-Unbundle-libxgboost.-dll-dylib-so.patch
    - 0002-Fix-R-package-PKGROOT.patch
build:
  noarch: false
  noarch_python: false
  number: '0'
  string: py37hf985489_0
requirements:
  host:
    - ca-certificates 2020.12.5 h033912b_0
    - libcxx 11.1.0 habf9029_0
    - libffi 3.3 h046ec9c_2
    - llvm-openmp 11.1.0 hda6cdc1_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - openssl 1.1.1k h0d85af4_0
    - python 3.7.10 h7728216_100_cpython
    - readline 8.1 h05e3726_0
    - sqlite 3.35.5 h44b9ce1_0
    - tk 8.6.10 h0419947_1
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1010
  run:
    - llvm-openmp >=11.1.0
    - py-xgboost 1.4.0 py37hf985489_0
    - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
    - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
about:
  description: 'XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed
    to be highly efficient,

    flexible and portable. It implements machine learning algorithms under the Gradient
    Boosting

    framework. XGBoost provides a parallel tree boosting (also known as GBDT, GBM)
    that solve many

    data science problems in a fast and accurate way. The same code runs on major
    distributed

    environment (Hadoop, SGE, MPI) and can solve problems beyond billions of examples.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/dmlc/xgboost/
  doc_url: https://xgboost.readthedocs.io/
  home: https://github.com/dmlc/xgboost
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Scalable, Portable and Distributed Gradient Boosting (GBDT, GBRT or GBM)
    Library, for

    Python, R, Java, Scala, C++ and more. Runs on single machine, Hadoop, Spark, Flink

    and DataFlow

    '
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: xgboost
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - aldanor
    - jakirkham
    - ksangeek
    - xhochy
